Package coordinators

Class TransactionsCoordinator

java.lang.Object
coordinators.GeneralCoordinator
coordinators.TransactionsCoordinator
public class TransactionsCoordinator
extends GeneralCoordinator
The TransactionsCoordinator class is a sub class of GeneralCoordinator class it contains methods that check the user's input from HomePage and if it meets the business rules through BusinessRules and a connection to the database through Transactions class.

      public boolean withdraw​(double amount)
      Checks if the withdrawal meets the business rules and it has been done successfully, and records the transaction.
      Parameters:
      amount - the double value of amount of money to withdraw.
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal transaction meets the business rules and has been done successfully; false otherwise.
